gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Thunder 127, Celtics 123
gameRecap.excerpt: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander led the way with 36 points, six rebounds, seven assists and 0 turnovers as the Thunder defeated the Celtics, 127-123.  Kristaps Porzingis (34 points, 10 rebounds, three blocks) and Jayson Tatum (30 points, 13 rebounds, eight assists) combine for 64 points for the Celtics in the losing effort.  The Thunder have won five consecutive games and improve to 23-9 on the season, while the Celtics fall to 26-7.
